title: FAQs | Career Nexus 2025
text_lines: is a celebrative segment of Career Nexus, which aims to commemorate 10 years of fruitful collaboration with our esteemed IWSP partners and highlight the transformative impact IWSP has had on SITizens, significantly enhancing their career readiness and providing invaluable industry experience.
This segment is for industry partners only.
All students seeking IWSP and full-time positions after graduation are strongly encouraged to attend.
Is the event open to the public?
This event is organised exclusively for SIT students and alumni only.
Who are the Industry Partners participating in Career Nexus 2025?
More than 250 companies from various industries are participating in the event.
The full list of companies can be viewed here (coming soon).
How can I register for Career Nexus 2025?
You can register for Career Nexus 2025
Student registration will only commence in November 2024.
What time is the registration on the event day?
The networking segment will be from 1:30pm to 5:30pm.
What is the dress code for the event?
As CN2025 is a professional networking event, students are to dress in business formal attire. Those who fail to adhere to the dress code may be excluded from the event.
This is my first networking event. How can I prepare myself?
: Before attending the event, do some basic research about the companies you are interested in.
: Have a short list of questions ready about company culture, professional development opportunities, mentorship programs, or anything else you want to learn about.
: Your resume communicates your qualifications and your brand— who you are and what makes you different—to employers and recruiters.
Feel free to schedule a consultation session with your programme
Can I apply for a full-time job or IWSP position directly with the company during Career Nexus?
All IWSP applications must be done directly via the
For full-time positions, you may apply to the company directly.
How can I navigate around Punggol Campus?
Please look out for directional signages around the campus. You may also refer to this
Who do I contact if I have further questions?
Besides your programme Career Coach, you may reach out to us at
When and where will the event be held?
The event will be held on 22 January 2025 (Wednesday) at SIT Punggol Campus (East Zone), 1 Punggol Coast Road, Singapore 828608. Find out how to get to the campus
How can I register for the event?
You can register for the event
. By registering, you are signing up for
IWSP: 10 Years On and Career Nexus 2025. Company registration opens on
. A confirmation email will be sent upon successful application.
Is the event open to the public?
This event is organised exclusively for SIT industry partners, students and alumni only.
There will be a non-refundable registration fee of $200 nett per company.
What will be provided for the event?
Each company will be allocated a booth space with:
You may bring a pull up banner. Banner size must not exceed W80cm x H200cm.
Will there be power supply provided?
Power supply is not provided at each individual booth. However, there will be a self-serviced area to charge your devices.
Can we request for additional space, table/booth or make any other special arrangements (giveaways / food and drinks / live stations / robots)?
Due to the space constraints, we will not be able to accommodate such requests.
When can I set up the company booth for Career Nexus 2025?
The booth set up will on the event day, 22 January 2025 from 9:30am.
What parking arrangements / alternatives are available at the venue?

SIT Punggol Campus is located within Punggol Digital District (PDD), a designated car-lite district that aims to reduce traffic congestion, promote sustainable transportation options and create a more environmentally friendly community. Hence, parking spaces within the campus are limited and charges applies.
You are strongly encouraged to use the public transport available:
Short-trip service 84A - 8am to 9.15am on weekdays during SIT trimester terms
Teck Lee LRT station -  approximately a one-kilometre walk via the covered pedestrian linkway and through Campus Boulevard.
Punggol Coast MRT station - located right at the doorstep of the campus
How many company representatives can we bring for the event?
representatives per company. You may also bring
working in your company, if any.
How do I contact the organisers for this event if I have further questions?
For further enquiries, please reach out to us at
